FuncDef: This parameter specifies the number of AP identifying VLAN tags for an AP. This is the default value that can be overridden per SAP. This value should at least be equal to the number of VLANs configured in the SAP or enabling a SAP will fail.

ParaDef.Info: Both the SAP and the AP are not VLAN-tagged.
Either the AP or the SAP uses one VLAN tag.
Up to two VLAN tags are used by the AP or SAP.
